parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Spell-check options as defined in swCheckSpellingOptions_e

parameters.name: Dictionary
parameters.description: Full path and filename of user dictionary to use (see Remarks )

title: IAnnotation.CheckSpelling
description: Spell checks the text in this annotation.
signature:
System.Object CheckSpelling( 
   System.Int32
Options
,
   System.String
Dictionary
)

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Spell-check options as defined in swCheckSpellingOptions_e

parameters.name: Dictionary
parameters.description: Full path and filename of user dictionary to use (see Remarks )

returns: Array of the misspelled words in this annotation
remarks:
The SOLIDWORKS spell checker always uses a main dictionary, which is language specific. Use the Dictionary argument to specify an additional dictionary. If Dictionary is left blank, then no additional user dictionary is used.
You can also specify additional custom dictionaries by adding them in the appropriate location in the SOLIDWORKS registry.
